text: ninnal ninnalute nathanaya allahuveat papameacanam tetuka. avankalekk pascattapiccu matannuka. enkil oru niscitakalam vare avan ninnalkk uttamamaya jivita vibhavam nalkum. sresthata pularttunnavarkk tannalute sresthatakkeatta pratiphalamunt. athava, ninnal pintiriyunnuvenkil bhikaramaya oru nalile siksa ninnalkkuntakumenn nan bhayappetunnu
